<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">seaborn</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">sns</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">statsmodels.api</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">sm</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span>

<span class="c1">############################################# create collinear data #############################################</span>

<span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">seed</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">generate_collinear_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">true_intercept</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">feature_means</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="c1"># random generation of 3D gaussian collinear features.</span>
    <span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">multivariate_normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">feature_means</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cov</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># generate gaussian white noise.</span>
    <span class="n">gaussian_noise</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">scale</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># make the outcome.</span>
    <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">true_intercept</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">gaussian_noise</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="p">)):</span>
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span>

<span class="c1"># settings</span>
<span class="n">correlation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.3</span>                          <span class="c1"># degree of collinearity (HIGH)</span>

<span class="n">kwargs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">'n'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">],</span>    <span class="c1"># linear regression coefficients, 2 features</span>
    <span class="s1">'true_intercept'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>                    <span class="c1"># y-intercept</span>
    <span class="s1">'feature_means'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">],</span>       <span class="c1"># means multivariate normal distribution. This is not important</span>
    <span class="s1">'loc'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span>                               <span class="c1"># mean of gaussian noise</span>
    <span class="s1">'scale'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span>                              <span class="c1"># standard deviation of gaussian noise</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1"># high collinearity covariance matrix</span>
<span class="n">cov</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">full</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">]),</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">])),</span> <span class="n">correlation</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fill_diagonal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">generate_collinear_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">############################################ Add interaction terms ###############################################</span>

<span class="n">features</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_1$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1"># original</span>
<span class="n">df_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df_org</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2 \cdot X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_org</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">df_org</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>
<span class="n">corr_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_org</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">method</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'kendall'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>

<span class="c1"># mean-centered</span>
<span class="n">scaler</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">with_mean</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">with_std</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">X_cnt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">scaler</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df_cnt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_cnt</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2 \cdot X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>
<span class="n">corr_cnt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">method</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'kendall'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>

<span class="c1">###################################################### plot ######################################################</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">figsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">11.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">cmap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diverging_palette</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">220</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">as_cmap</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sep</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">heatmap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">corr_org</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cmap</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cmap</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">vmin</span><span class="o">=-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">vmax</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">center</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">linewidths</span><span class="o">=.</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">annot</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">heatmap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">corr_cnt</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cmap</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cmap</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">vmin</span><span class="o">=-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">vmax</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">center</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">linewidths</span><span class="o">=.</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">annot</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xticklabels</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_org</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_yticklabels</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_org</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Original'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.9</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'aegis4048.github.io'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'center'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">va</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'center'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
             <span class="n">transform</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transAxes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'grey'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xticklabels</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_yticklabels</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Mean-centered'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.9</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'aegis4048.github.io'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'center'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">va</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'center'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
             <span class="n">transform</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transAxes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'grey'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.43</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'$\Longrightarrow$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">transform</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">axes</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transAxes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">30</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">suptitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Kendall</span><span class="se">\'</span><span class="s1">s correlation coefficient matrix'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tight_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rect</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.94</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>

<span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2 \cdot X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">

<div class="output_area">

<pre>array([ 67.44330961,  70.24218782, 124.87759573, 131.95192727])</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>array([66.18666789, 60.01401724, 36.63775074])</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<ol>
<li><p>Changes the interpretation of coefficients.</p>
</li>
<li><p>Intercept has more meaningful interpretation.</p>
</li>
<li><p>Interaction terms are unaffected.</p>
</li>
<li><p>Variables not involved with interaction terms are unaffected</p>
</li>
<li><p>Intercept has more meaningful interpretation.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p>As far as the interpretation is concerned: Before centering α, its meaning is the height of a person with weight 0. Thus, α would be a just a numerical intercept (possibly negative) without any real world interpretation. Centering the data around the mean of the weight, will lead to α representing the height of a person with average weight. In this case, the numeric value of α has a real world interpretation.</p>
<p>Figure.</p>
<p><a href="https://online.stat.psu.edu/stat462/node/182/">https://online.stat.psu.edu/stat462/node/182/</a></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<div id="Principle component regression"></div><h3 id="5.4-Principle-component-regression">5.4 Principle component regression<a class="anchor-link" href="#5.4-Principle-component-regression">¶</a></h3><p>One major use of PCA lies in overcoming the multicollinearity problem. PCA can aptly deal with such situations by excluding some of the low-variance principal components in the regression step. In addition, by usually regressing on only a subset of all the principal components, PCR can result in dimension reduction through substantially lowering the effective number of parameters characterizing the underlying model.</p>
<ul>
<li>Handles with feature elimination & lowering collinearity</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span>

<span class="c1">############################################# import data #############################################</span>

<span class="n">file</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'sample_data/collinear.csv'</span>
<span class="n">features</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_1$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_4$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_5$'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span>

<span class="c1">############################################# import data #############################################</span>

<span class="n">file</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'sample_data/collinear.csv'</span>
<span class="n">features</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_1$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_4$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_5$'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1">####################################### VIFs with original data #######################################</span>

<span class="n">vifs_orig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">df_vif_orig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_orig</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Features'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_orig</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'VIF'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">vifs_orig</span>

<span class="c1">##################################### VIFs with interaction terms #####################################</span>

<span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2 \cdot X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>
<span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_1^2$'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_1$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span> <span class="o">**</span> <span class="mi">2</span>

<span class="n">vifs_inter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">df_vif_inter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_inter</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Features'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_inter</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'VIF'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">vifs_inter</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_vif_orig</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_vif_inter</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>  Features       VIF
0    $X_1$  5.398315
1    $X_2$  2.378517
2    $X_3$  8.598212
3    $X_4$  2.157740
4    $X_5$  3.700524

          Features       VIF
0            $X_1$  5.420306
1            $X_2$  2.379443
2            $X_3$  8.655563
3            $X_4$  2.186982
4            $X_5$  3.708457
5  $X_2 \cdot X_3$  1.243502
6          $X_1^2$  1.160139
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [ ]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Structural multicollinearity</p>
<p>Data multicollinearity</p>
<p><a href="https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/223432/standardising-non-normally-distributed-predictors-for-regression">https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/223432/standardising-non-normally-distributed-predictors-for-regression</a></p>
<p>Centering is just a linear transformation, so it will not change anything about the shapes of the distributions or the relationship between them. Instead, it just slides them in one direction or the other.</p>
<p>When the model is additive and linear, centering has nothing to do with collinearity. Centering can only help when there are multiple terms per variable such as square or interaction terms.</p>
<p>Making zero intercept makes the model more interpretable</p>
<p><a href="https://www3.nd.edu/~rwilliam/stats2/l53.pdf">https://www3.nd.edu/~rwilliam/stats2/l53.pdf</a></p>
<p>Standardized coefficients interpretation is difficult.</p>
<p>Why does centering work? Read (here)[<a href="https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/65898/why-could-centering-independent-variables-change-the-main-effects-with-moderation">https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/65898/why-could-centering-independent-variables-change-the-main-effects-with-moderation</a>]</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<div id="Elimination"></div><h3 id="5.3-Elimination">5.3 Elimination<a class="anchor-link" href="#5.3-Elimination">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Demonstration">Demonstration<a class="anchor-link" href="#Demonstration">¶</a></h4><div class="row full_screen_margin_70 mobile_responsive_plot_full_width" id="fig-12" style="margin-top: 15px;">
<div class="col"><img src="jupyter_images/multicollinearity_standardization_remedy.png"/></div>
<div class="col-12"><p class="image-description">Figure 12: Effect of interaction terms on VIF</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="In-practice....">In practice....<a class="anchor-link" href="#In-practice....">¶</a></h4><p>Used to reduce the std error of statsmodel linear regression analysis</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">statsmodels.api</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">sm</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>

<span class="c1">######################################## Collinear random data generation #########################################</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">generate_collinear_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">true_intercept</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">feature_means</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                            <span class="n">true_coefs_interaction</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]):</span>

    <span class="c1"># random generation of 3D gaussian collinear features.</span>
    <span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">multivariate_normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">feature_means</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cov</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># generate gaussian white noise.</span>
    <span class="n">gaussian_noise</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">scale</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># make the outcome.</span>
    <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">true_intercept</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">gaussian_noise</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="p">)):</span>
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
        
    <span class="c1">#y += true_coefs_interaction[0] * (X[:, 0] ** 2) + true_coefs_interaction[1] * X[:, 1] * X[:, 2]</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span>

<span class="c1"># settings</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1000</span>                                   <span class="c1"># number of simulations</span>
<span class="n">correlation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.01</span>                          <span class="c1"># degree of collinearity (HIGH)</span>

<span class="n">kwargs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">'n'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">10000</span><span class="p">,</span>                             <span class="c1"># sample size</span>
    <span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">42</span><span class="p">],</span>         <span class="c1"># linear regression coefficients, 2 features</span>
    <span class="s1">'true_intercept'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">,</span>                   <span class="c1"># y-intercept</span>
    <span class="s1">'feature_means'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">],</span>     <span class="c1"># means multivariate normal distribution. This is not important</span>
    <span class="s1">'loc'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span>                               <span class="c1"># mean of gaussian noise</span>
    <span class="s1">'scale'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span>                             <span class="c1"># standard deviation of gaussian noise</span>
    <span class="s1">'true_coefs_interaction'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">]</span>       <span class="c1"># linear regression coefficients of interaction terms</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1"># high collinearity covariance matrix</span>
<span class="n">cov</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">full</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">]),</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">])),</span> <span class="n">correlation</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fill_diagonal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'True intercept + coefficients:  '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_intercept'</span><span class="p">]]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs_interaction'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1">############################################# Original #############################################</span>

<span class="n">X_org</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">generate_collinear_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">#interaction_org_1 = X_org[:, 0].reshape(-1, 1) ** 2                            # x1^2</span>
<span class="c1">#interaction_org_2 = X_org[:, 1].reshape(-1, 1) * X_org[:, 2].reshape(-1, 1)    # x2 * x3</span>
<span class="c1">#X_org = np.concatenate([X_org, interaction_org_1, interaction_org_2], axis=1)</span>

<span class="n">X_st_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_constant</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_org</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">model_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">OLS</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_org</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_st_org</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Original: '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="s1">'</span><span class="si">%.2f</span><span class="s1">'</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="n">elem</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">elem</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">model_org</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">params</span> <span class="p">])</span>

<span class="c1">########################################## Mean-centered ###########################################</span>

<span class="n">X_std</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">generate_collinear_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># centering</span>
<span class="n">scaler</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">with_mean</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">with_std</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">X_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">scaler</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_std</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># X_std, y_std = scaler.fit_transform(X_std), scaler.fit_transform(y_std.reshape(-1, 1)).flatten()</span>

<span class="c1"># add interaction terms</span>
<span class="c1">#interaction_std_1 = X_std[:, 0].reshape(-1, 1) ** 2                            # x1^2</span>
<span class="c1">#interaction_std_2 = X_std[:, 1].reshape(-1, 1) * X_std[:, 2].reshape(-1, 1)    # x2 * x3</span>
<span class="c1">#X_std = np.concatenate([X_std, interaction_std_1, interaction_std_2], axis=1)</span>

<span class="c1"># fit</span>
<span class="n">X_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_constant</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_std</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">model_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">OLS</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y_std</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_std</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Centering:  '</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="s1">'</span><span class="si">%.2f</span><span class="s1">'</span> <span class="o">%</span> <span class="n">elem</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">elem</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">model_std</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">params</span> <span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>True intercept + coefficients:   [15, 13, 0.5, 5, 42, -2, 9]

Original:  ['14.81', '13.00', '0.50', '4.99', '41.99']
Centering:   ['-963.70', '13.00', '0.51', '5.00', '42.01']
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">vifs_std</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_org</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>  
</pre></div>

<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_org</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">vifs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">variance_inflation_factor</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])]</span>

<span class="n">vifs</span>
</pre></div>

<pre>[5086.798113631407,
 913.5323590009473,
 922.5802364981283,

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">seaborn</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">sns</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">statsmodels.api</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">sm</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.preprocessing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span>

<span class="c1">############################################# create collinear data #############################################</span>

<span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">seed</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">generate_collinear_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">true_intercept</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">feature_means</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="c1"># random generation of 3D gaussian collinear features.</span>
    <span class="n">X</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">multivariate_normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">feature_means</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cov</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># generate gaussian white noise.</span>
    <span class="n">gaussian_noise</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">normal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">scale</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">scale</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">n</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># make the outcome.</span>
    <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">true_intercept</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">gaussian_noise</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="p">)):</span>
        <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">true_coefs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="p">[:,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span>

<span class="c1"># settings</span>
<span class="n">correlation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.98</span>                           <span class="c1"># degree of collinearity (LOW)</span>

<span class="n">kwargs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="s1">'n'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">13</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">],</span>             <span class="c1"># linear regression coefficients, 2 features</span>
    <span class="s1">'true_intercept'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span>                    <span class="c1"># y-intercept</span>
    <span class="s1">'feature_means'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">15</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">],</span>            <span class="c1"># means multivariate normal distribution. This is not important</span>
    <span class="s1">'loc'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span>                               <span class="c1"># mean of gaussian noise</span>
    <span class="s1">'scale'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">1</span>                              <span class="c1"># standard deviation of gaussian noise</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="c1"># low collinearity covariance matrix</span>
<span class="n">cov</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">full</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">]),</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'true_coefs'</span><span class="p">])),</span> <span class="n">correlation</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fill_diagonal</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">generate_collinear_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cov</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1">############################################ Add interaction terms ###############################################</span>

<span class="n">features</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_1$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1"># original</span>
<span class="n">df_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># interaction</span>
<span class="n">df_int</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df_int</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2 \cdot X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_int</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">df_int</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>
<span class="n">corr_int</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_int</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">method</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'kendall'</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>

<span class="c1"># mean-centered</span>
<span class="n">scaler</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">StandardScaler</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">with_mean</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">with_std</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">X_cnt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">scaler</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_transform</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df_cnt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_cnt</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">features</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2 \cdot X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_2$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'$X_3$'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span>

<span class="c1">################################################## Commput VIFs ##################################################</span>

<span class="n">vifs_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_org</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_org</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_org</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Features'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_org</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_org</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'VIF'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">vifs_org</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_vif_org</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">vifs_int</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_int</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_int</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_int</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Features'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_int</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_int</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'VIF'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">vifs_int</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_vif_int</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">vifs_cnt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linalg</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">inv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">corr</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">diagonal</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_cnt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Features'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">df_cnt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span>
<span class="n">df_vif_cnt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'VIF'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">vifs_cnt</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df_vif_cnt</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
